title: Public transport for the NRL Round 6 –  Melbourne Storm v New Zealand Warriors: Sunday 13 April 2025
articleContent:
The NRL season continues at AAMI Park, where the Storm hosts the Warriors on Sunday, 13 April. Public transport is your best way to enjoy the action.

Extra services will help you get home from AAMI Park.

Kick-off is at 2:00 pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Return service from Richmond Station

  • Glen Waverley – leaving at 4:07pm from Platform 10
  • Sandringham – leaving at 4:14pm from Platform 2

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from AAMI Park

Route 70

  • Trams will operate from Flinders Street / Elizabeth Street (Stop 4) and Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.

 Metropolitan bus

Customers can catch the following buses close to AAMI Park:

  • Route 246

 Regional train

  • Normal services departing from Southern Cross Station
